# Fabric ISIS Redistribute Metric

Location in GUI:
`System` » `System Settings` » `ISIS Policy`

### Terraform modules

* [Fabric ISIS Policy](https://registry.terraform.io/modules/netascode/fabric-isis-policy/aci/latest)

{{ aac_doc }}

### Examples

```yaml
apic:
  fabric_policies:
    fabric_isis_redistribute_metric: 59
```
